arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ ثَوْبَ يُمْنٍ وَتُقًى وَبَرَكَةٍ
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِيْ كَسَانِيْ مَا اُوَارِيْ بِهِ عَوْرَتِيْ
translation: O Allah make it a dress of prosperity and piety and blessings
O Allah provide me in it the best of your worship
and acts of obedience to You
and the fullfillment of thankfullness for Your blessing
All praise is for Allah who clothed me with what I cover my private parts
transliteration: al ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī kasānī mā uwārī bihi `awratī
